<h3 id="X21617">X(21617)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: WASAT AND HONSBERGER</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; ((b+c)*a^2-2*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))*(a-b+c)*(a+b-c)  :  :
<p>X(21617) lies on these lines:
{1,6835}, {2,7}, {4,7675}, {5,5728}, {8,11526}, {10,7672}, {11,5572}, {12,518}, {35,411}, {65,3826}, {77,948}, {78,2550}, {80,14151}, {85,17234}, {241,17245}, {273,1826}, {278,5287}, {347,5308}, {349,18137}, {390,946}, {495,1512}, {528,4870}, {651,3664}, {664,17317}, {673,2259}, {936,12560}, {938,5261}, {950,6894}, {954,3149}, {971,6831}, {1001,11344}, {1100,5723}, {1125,7677}, {1170,5526}, {1210,3947}, {1229,1441}, {1446,5179}, {1465,2197}, {1699,4326}, {1836,11495}, {2327,16054}, {2346,11218}, {2801,8068}, {2886,3059}, {2911,5228}, {3091,5809}, {3174,3434}, {3243,9578}, {3358,6833}, {3487,5720}, {3553,4000}, {3671,5692}, {3817,7671}, {3838,15587}, {3870,6601}, {3944,4335}, {3946,7269}, {4292,6986}, {4298,5251}, {4301,7673}, {4312,21153}, {4321,5290}, {4323,20007}, {4328,4859}, {4425,8238}, {4675,6180}, {5223,5705}, {5686,21075}, {5714,6865}, {5732,6836}, {5735,6962}, {5738,5816}, {5759,6988}, {5817,6855}, {5880,11509}, {6245,12669}, {6700,11263}, {6737,17097}, {6828,10394}, {6996,18650}, {7670,21633}, {8226,11018}, {8236,12053}, {8237,12610}, {8255,14100}, {8287,18635}, {8385,21618}, {8386,21619}, {8387,21622}, {8388,21623}, {8389,21624}, {8581,15844}, {9846,21625}, {10265,12755}, {10478,10889}, {10481,17092}, {10865,11019}, {10944,15570}, {11372,11919}, {12399,21626}, {12630,21627}, {12706,21628}, {12718,21629}, {12730,21630}, {12846,21631}, {12847,21632}, {12850,21634}, {14189,17084}, {14564,15492}, {16826,17086}</p>
<p>
X(21617) = X(21637)-of-Honsberger triangle<br>
X(21617) = X(21637)-of-Wasat triangle<br>
X(21617) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 7, 1445), (7, 5226, 8232), (7, 8232, 8545), (7, 18230, 12848), (142, 226, 7), (226, 5219, 908), (948, 4648, 77), (1125, 12573, 7677), (5805, 11374, 954), (7672, 7679, 10)<br>
